website_summaries.verdict: The HP Bluetooth Foldable Keyboard is the perfect travel companion for your Bluetooth-enabled iPaq.

customer_reviews.title: Great item for typing in lots of data
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, portable keyboard. It worked with my iPAQ hx2755 the first time I tried it. It amazed my neighbors on the airplane when I whipped it out and started typing away on it. If you have a lot of typing to do, this is the way to do it. It is small and takes a little adjustment, but if you are a quick typist it beats using a stylus to tap your entries in. Now if they could just get a mouse to go with it.....
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Handy iPAQ accessory
customer_reviews.text: This foldable keyboard is great for allowing the use of your PDA as a mini notebook. It is compact and light. I use it when I am flying. It is also great at home when I have large entries to make because it has a jack that allows for the iPAQ to run on AC instead of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes typing much easier to do on such a small computer.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS EVANS JR

customer_reviews.title: Not Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Like the others, this is not the Bluetooth keyboard that was advertised. First time ever I got the wrong product from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Condon

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. It does seem to be a little delicate, so I open and close it very slowly and carefully, but once it is open, it does a great job. I had a little trouble with repeating keys at first, but once I turned on the keyboard sound, I can tell when it is happening before I look up and see 500 X's on the screen. It was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: L. Potter

customer_reviews.title: The only choice, no literally the only choice!
customer_reviews.text: I have the IPAQ 4150, which is limited in the accessory department. I first bought an IR keyboard to find the transmitter wouldn't work with my IPAQ due to the fact the IR port is on the bottom of the unit. So after a trip back to the store, I broke down and bought the HP brand. I wish I had bought it here, because my local electronics store was twenty dollars more. My only complaint is the keyboard wobbles while typing, because the back support rest is about half an inch to short to prevent this. One could probably fix this by weighting the back end a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Adams

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard gets the job done, compact, folds away nicely. The downside is that unlike most othe PDA keyboards it plugs in instead of using wireless or Bleutooth. It also lacks a power source (ie. battery, Ac adapter) and can drain your PDA's battery. The main positive is that it is compatible, the only keyboard compatible with this set of HP products. Oh one other thing, if you're using POCKET PC windows 2003 or newer your gonna need to download a new driver from HP's website, as what they packadge with the product is now old and no longer compatible.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Get real, this is not a Bluetooth keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Eventhough Amazon represents it as a Bluetooth HP FA287A#AC3, it is NOT, it is the FA118 that they send you. They did it to me twice and they haven't credited my account for the mistake. What Amazon is selling is the older version direct connect keyboard not the new wireless version. The older version won't even connect to the new hx4700 IPAQ as they claim. Don't be foooled like I was...
customer_reviews.author: Lester J. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Foldable Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The foldable keyboard is perfect. It workes perfectly and everyone that has seen and used it is impressed. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nance

customer_reviews.title: Not as represented
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my HP4705. This is not a bluetooth keyboard. they sent two of them both the same non-bluetooth item. Now I have to send back and hope I get credit.
customer_reviews.author: L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard! first one lasted 2 years... could be better
customer_reviews.text: this keyboard is very compact! it is well made and looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Yessayian

product_meta.title: HP FA118A#ABA iPAQ Foldable Keyboard for H2200, H3800, H3900, H4100, H5000, H6300, RX3000, and HX4700 Series
feature_bullets: High portability and ease of use
Functionality equal to a full-sized standard keyboard
Charge your iPAQ Pocket PC while using the keyboard through the power pass-through jack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars19 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
